plot: Red River Dave and his Texas Tophands save a friend's ranch by staging a rodeo-benefit. But the proceeds from the rodeo are stolen and Dave his cowhands track down the robbers and return the money.
title: Echo Ranch
plot_es: Red River Dave and his Texas Tophands save a friend's ranch by staging a rodeo-benefit. But the proceeds from the rodeo are stolen and Dave his cowhands track down the robbers and return the money.
plot_en: Red River Dave and his Texas Tophands save a friend's ranch by staging a rodeo-benefit. But the proceeds from the rodeo are stolen and Dave his cowhands track down the robbers and return the money.
